title: Bear Creek Smokehouse Recalls Beef Products Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: EDITORS NOTE: This release is being reissued to include additional product. WASHINGTON, March 14, 2015 Bear Creek Smokehouse, a Marshall, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 3,700 pounds of beef products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and...
